Text:
Season 1 special features are the best out of them all.  Seriously.  The other ones are alright -but season 1's are the best, IMHO.  (Though I haven't seen season 5's yet)  Unfortunatly, I don't own them, my mother does (and she would never let me borrow them to rip them, unfortunatly).  

You COULD buy them all, eventually...but whatever.  Hopefully someone that has the series can actually torrent them.
Thanks a lot for this special
